Package com.github.natanbc.lavadsp.chain

Class ChainedFilterBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.natanbc.lavadsp.chain.ChainedFilterBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.PcmFilterFactory
    public class ChainedFilterBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.PcmFilterFactory
    Utility class for building ChainedFilter objects, which chains multiple filters and allows reconfiguring filters by type as needed.
    This class may also be directly provided to AudioPlayer.setFilterFactory(PcmFilterFactory), but the resulting filters may not be reconfigured.

      • addConfigurator

        public <T extends com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.AudioFilter> void addConfigurator​(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                                                            java.util.function.Consumer<T> configurator)
        Adds a configurator that gets called when a filter of the specified type is created.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Filter type.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class of the filter that should be configured.
        configurator - Configures the filter when it's created. May be called multiple times.

      • buildUnlinked

        public UnlinkedChainedFilter buildUnlinked​(com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.format.AudioDataFormat format)
        Builds an unlinked chained filter, used for convenience in cases such as 
         
 ChainedFilterBuilder builder = new ChainedFilterBuilder();

 builder.add(TimescalePcmAudioFilter::new);
 builder.add(TremoloPcmAudioFilter::new);

 builder.addConfigurator(TremoloPcmAudioFilter.class, filter->filter.setDepth(0.8));
 builder.addConfigurator(TimescalePcmAudioFilter.class, filter->filter.setSpeed(2));

 UnlinkedChainedFilter filter = builder.buildUnlinked(StandardAudioDataFormats.DISCORD_OPUS);

 audioPlayer.setFilterFactory(filter);

 //some time later

 filter.configure(X.class, x->x.setY(y));
        This filter may be provided directly to AudioPlayer.setFilterFactory(PcmFilterFactory).
        Parameters:
        format - Audio format to use when building the chain.
        Returns:
        The newly created filter.
        See Also:
        build(AudioDataFormat, UniversalPcmAudioFilter)

      • build

        public ChainedFilter build​(com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.format.AudioDataFormat format,
                           com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.UniversalPcmAudioFilter output)
        Builds and links a new filter. This is equivalent to calling buildUnlinked(format).link(output).
        The returned filter is actually an instance of UnlinkedChainedFilter.
        Parameters:
        format - Audio format to use when building the chain.
        output - Output to write generated audio to.
        Returns:
        The newly created filter.

      • buildChain

        public java.util.List<com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.AudioFilter> buildChain​(com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.track.AudioTrack track,
